artist: Artist: Kawase Hasui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: landscape; figure working under a sunshade at a pond near fields and trees
inscription: LL margin: 大正十八二十一 {Taishō jū hachi nijūichi} (August 21st, 1921)
markings: LRC, red lozenge artist\'s seal: 川セ {Kawase}; LLC, round publisher seal A: ワタナベ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Souvenirs of Travel, Second Collection (Tabi miyage dai nishū 旅みやげ第二集)
text: Hasui’s second Souvenirs of Travel series, issued from January to December of 1921, comprises twenty-eight designs. Six depict Sado, the largest island in the Sea of Japan, off the coast of Niigata Prefecture.
title: Water conduit, a scene in Sado
